name: Ms. Gaofodisi.jpg
title: Head of the Tutoring Committee
bio: Serves as the head of the Tutoring Committee for the Mochwanaesi Foundation, where she leads efforts to provide effective academic support to learners. In addition to her leadership role, she is also a mentor.

name: Mr. Makhutle
title: Treasurer of the Mochwanaesi Foundation
bio: Serves as the Treasurer of the Mochwanaesi Foundation, he also acts as the head of the Finance Committee, overseeing budgeting, financial planning, and fund allocation. In addition to his financial duties, Mr. Makhutle is also a tutor and mentor

name: A.msila
title: Tutor
bio: The beautiful learning thin about learning is that no one can take it away from you
